welcome.welcomeDescription: The project management application will help solve work tasks efficiently. Application is a digital board that provides a visual of the work you need to get done. You can move and prioritize tasks on a project board as the project evolves and changes. A project board allows you to easily see the big picture so you can prioritize tasks effectively. Itâ€™s also an effective and efficient way of managing the work of your team and keeping everyone on the same page.
welcome.benefitsDescriptionOne: Get a high-level view of project progress
welcome.benefitsDescriptionTwo: Know exactly what stage any given project is at
welcome.benefitsDescriptionFour: Know where you need to reallocate resources
welcome.oppotunitiesDescriptionTwo: Create tasks, check done, transfer tasks
welcome.oppotunitiesDescriptionThree: Search by tasks boards or performers
welcome.oppotunitiesDescriptionFour: Estimate timelines, plan, monitor and track tasks
welcome.courseInfo: This tutorial project was developed as part of the free online course "Javascript/Front-end Mentoring Program (in English)" from The Rolling Scopes community. The RS School is working by the principle of "Pay it forward." Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence.
welcome.devDescription: Hello! I started my coding journey in august 2022 and fell in love with coding. Before that I was far from coding, but I am aimed at switching my career. I specialised in Frontend Development as I'm passionate to combine design and technical knowledge.
